title: I can't reconnect to my game.
body:
Hello People from Riot.
I was playing a AR URF game and i was like 10 minutes in the game and i suddenly got attempting to reconnect. So I left the game and wanted to go back in the game. But i was in the client (Home of the client with Loot and Store and Profile etc.). Our wifi is working fine no issues. I can go on youtube and google etc. Is there a bug or something with the client? If i get a 20 minute queue timer, can you please remove it. It's not I was inting or some shit. Please fix this Riot Employess.

Thank you! :)
IGN: TheDowner123

replies.body:
Hmmm....just to clarify, when you got the "Attempting to Reconnect" pop-up in your ARURF game, and left, did you not see the option to get back into the game when you got back into the client?  Is there any record of this match appearing in your match history page?

If it seems like the game was never actually played, I think you might have hit a new bug introduced with Ornn.  Some of Ornn's abilities, when interacted with other champions, could cause the game to completely crash for all players (as if it never happened).  This bug should already be fixed or fixed in the very near future, so hopefully you won't encounter it again!

If anything comes up again, feel free to hit me back up!
